title: 3 and Out - Rodgers Shows, Watson Stuck, Training Camp Evaluations, CFB Super Conferences, Mailbag
itunes:title: 3 and Out - Rodgers Shows, Watson Stuck, Training Camp Evaluations, CFB Super Conferences, Mailbag
description:
In this episode, players are reporting to NFL training camps across the league and John is kicks things off by discussing Aaron Rodgers concluding his contentious offseason by reporting to training camp, why he's calling BS on rumors that teams are interested in trading for Deshaun Watson, why there's nothing like the level playing field of training camp evaluations, and why the era of rival college football super conferences is just getting started as the B1G starts recruiting schools. He also answers listener questions in the Middlekauff Mailbag. Follow John on Twitter and SUBSCRIBE now to get all the latest content!!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
